persName.term: Alternate Personal Name, Previously Used Name

person.note: Fan(2) Zhongyan [8043] Fan(2) Yu [3290], the fifth generation ancestor of Zhongyan, his elder brother, Zhongwen [7214] and their lineage cousin, Qi [3273] (Shidao's [581] father), held office in Su Zhou 蘇州 at the end of the Tang and remained as a resident of Wu Xian 吳縣. Zhongyan moved to Henan, Luoyang Xian where he was buried. He was Chunren's [559], Chunli's [560] and Chuncui's [561] father, Zhengguo's [565] and Zhengping's [7212] grandfather, Shijing's [580] lineage granduncle, Shidao's [581] lineage uncle and probably Yinzhi's [590] great grandfather. Zhongyan was Zhirou's [7213] fifth generation ancestor and husband of Li(2) Changling's [974] niece. He was the father-in-law of Cai(1) Jiao [7068], Zhang(1) Wan [315], Cui(1) Baosun [7070] and Jia(3) Fan [7020] and grandfather-in-law of Zhang(1) Wan's [315] son, E(a) [4151]. Affinal relation of Teng(1) Gao [7349]. His daughter's [Zhang(2) Wan's wife] sons-in-law were Han(1) Lian [7230] and Song(2) Yinian [7345]. His collateral kin of the previous generation, Chi [3274], was Guo(1) Kui's [8072] son-in-law. Chi and Zhongyan's father had the same grandfather. Chi's grandson, Chuncheng [3275], used Zhongyan's yin to enter the civil service in 1143. Possibly kin of Lu(5) Shimin's [1287] father-in-law, Fan(2) Zhongmo [3278]. He was Teng(1) Zongliang's [1611] tongnianyou. The daughter of Li(2) Changling's [974] cousin, Li(2) Changyun [3472], was the mother of Xuzhou(c) resident Yan(4) Chongguo [4112]. Changling's son or nephew, Li(2) Yuqing(2) [3553], was the father-in-law of Yan(4) Chongguo's third wife. The fathers of Chongguo's first and second wives were respectively Huang(2) Zongdan [861] and Fan(2) Zhongyan [8043]. According to Fan Chunren, Chongguo's fathers-in-law were all from famous lineages (xingzu). Ouyang Xiu, WJ, 20.5b-9a; Chunren, WJ, 14.16b. CBD, 2, 1648-1652.

desc.desc: Patron of (= Client was)Supportive political association
Patron of (= Client was)Supportive political association
Patron of (= Client was)Supportive political association
Patron was (= Client of)Supportive political association

desc.label: 紘長於吏治 篤於交游 范仲淹被謫 朝士畏宰相無敢過者 紘獨出郊餞飲之
質獨克己好善 自奉簡素 范仲淹貶饒州 質持酒往餞 世以此益賢之
天聖二年進士 屢遷太子中允 會范仲淹貶 洙奏仲淹臣之師友 仲淹被罪
舊與高平范公之父相識京邑，范避地至潭，行裝垂罄，景裕亦困居，乃以千錢為贈，曰某雖貧，里中有所貸，公今流落途窮，少助行色。范謝其意而卻之。

desc.desc: Friend in the same graduating classAssociation through common membership

desc.label: 天聖二年進士 累官起居舍人、知諫院 范仲淹坐言事奪職 余靖、尹洙論救 均貶斥
由殿中丞策制科 擢右正言 首劾范仲淹、富弼 二人皆罷 累官翰林學士
康定中河東地震 舜欽詣匭通疏 范仲淹薦其才 召試集賢校理 監進奏院
逖子 元弟 以范仲淹薦召試為太廟齋郎 遷泰州海陵主簿 雖慷慨自許
舉李宗易堪任清要狀(范文正公集19/2下)
悉以頒諸親族 慶曆間 范仲淹薦為藍田簿 徙令林慮縣 俗以蒐田為生
問以天時人事 京好言兵 范仲淹與滕宗諒數薦之 故與復同被召
歐冶子鑄劍地也 富弼為築室以居 范仲淹、文彥博皆欲薦之 辭不就
除漳州通判 累官至朝請大夫 倣范仲淹例 以郊外田五百餘畝 創義莊以贍族人；又設義塾
desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.label: 東陽人 慕范仲淹之義 割腴田千畝立義莊以贍宗族 設義學以教里中子弟
desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.label: 字元佐 浦江人 嘗讀范仲淹義田記有感 遂捐常稔田二百畝 儲租以濟疏族鄰里之急者
desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.label: 王炎扁以靜勝 程珌記之 仿范仲淹義莊規模 為義廩以惠族屬 晚遇東朝錫類之恩
desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.label: 博學好禮 隱居城南 慕范仲淹建義莊以濟困乏
desc.desc: Praised or admired bySupportive political association

desc.label: 鄱陽人 與時知學 為范仲淹所賞 舉慶曆進士 察訪梓夔
其言事不為激訐 故多見推行 杜衍、范仲淹皆稱道之
素有節行 精於篆書 范仲淹嘗稱許之 王琪守潤 為薦於朝
諡元獻 殊平居好賢 范仲淹、孔道輔、歐陽修等皆出其門 及為相 仲淹與韓琦、富弼皆進用
謀議無所避 善知人 時范仲淹、龐籍方在下位 皆以公輔許之 有文集四十卷
論李昭亮不可典軍 梁適不當除翰林學士 范仲淹宜在左右 尹洙、余靖、歐陽修皆以朋黨斥逐 此小人惡直醜正者也
嘗以論范仲淹謫官事，與尹洙、歐陽修同被貶。
魯人號徂徠先生 慶曆中擢太子中允 時范仲淹、富弼、韓琦同時執政 歐陽修、余靖等並為諫官 介遂作慶曆聖德詩
